column2: "Na Nyankopɔn no sunsum baa Oded ba Azaria do;"

column6: hom ntsie me: EWURADZE wɔ hom nkyɛn
column7: aber a hom wɔ ne nkyɛn yi; na sɛ hom hwehwɛ no a
column8: hom bohu no; na sɛ hom pow no dze a

column2: "Afei mber tsentsenntsen na Israel tsenae a nna wonnyi nokwar Nyankopɔn
column3: na wonnyi ɔsɔfo so a ɔkyerɛkyerɛ

column2: "na sɛ ahokyer mu no wɔsan ba EWURADZE
"Na mber no mu no na asomdwee bi nnyi hɔ mma nyia ofir edzi na nyia ɔba mu so
column3: na ɔfona kɛse wɔ asaase no do atsefo no nyinara do."

column4: na kurow tsiaa kurow osiandɛ Nyankopɔn dze ahohia nyinara fonaa hɔn."
na mma mma hom abaw nngow: na hom edwuma benya akatua."

column2: "Na aber a Asa tsee nsɛm yi
column3: na nkɔnhyɛnyi Oded no nkɔnhyɛ no
column5: na oyiyii ekyiwadze no fii Juda na Benjamin asaase nyinara do
column6: na nkurow a ɔgyegyee no wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu no mu; na ɔyɛɛ EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia a ɔwɔ EWURADZE ne nkrandaa no enyim no fofor."

column3: na hɔn a wofi Efraim na Manaasɛ
column4: na Simeon mu baa hɔn nkyɛn ahɔhotsena no boaa ano; osiandɛ Israel mu piigyan danee baa ne nkyɛn
column5: aber a wohun dɛ n'EWURADZE Nyankopɔn dzi n'ekyir no."

column2: "Nna wohyiahyiaa hɔnho kehyiaa Jerusalɛm wɔ bosoom a otsia ebiasa no mu
column3: wɔ Asa n'ahendzi no mu afe a otsia duenum no mu."

column2: "Na da no wɔdze asadze a wɔdze bae no mu
column3: anantwi ahaesuon na nguan mpemesuon bɔɔ EWURADZE okum afɔr."

column2: "Na wodzii ahyɛmu dɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyinara na ɔnye hɔn kra nyinara bɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE
"na dɛ obiara a ɔnnkɛpɛ dɛ ɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE

column5: na ɔnye mbɛn suae kyerɛɛ EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Juda nyinara hɔn enyi gyee wɔ ntam no ho; osiandɛ hɔn akoma nyinara na wɔdze suae
column3: na wɔdze hɔn pɛ nyinara hwehwɛɛ no; na ɔmaa wohun no: na EWURADZE maa hɔn ahomgye wɔ mbea nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔhen Asa ne na Maaka so
column4: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ ekyiwa honyi bi maa Asera ntsi; na Asa twaa no honyi no
column6: na ɔkɛhyeew no wɔ ɔwora Kidron ho."

column2: "Asa enntum ennyiyi mbea sorɔnsorɔm no nyinara emmfi Israel: naaso n'akoma dze
column3: odzii mu wɔ ne nda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze ndzɛmba a n'egya yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn
column3: na dza nankasa yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn no baa Nyankopɔn ne fie

column2: "Na akodzi bi ammba araa dze kodur Asa n'ahendzi mu afe a otsia eduasa enum no mu."
